text: Platon Halavach (Belarusian, Платон Раманавіч Галавач; 1903 – October 29, 1937) was a Belarusian writer. During the Great Purge, he became a victim of the 1937 mass execution of Belarusians. ==Bibliography== * Ліўшыц, У.
